body.name: Sweetcrispy Office Computer Desk Chair, Ergonomic Mid-Back Mesh Rolling Work Swivel Task Chairs with Wheels, Comfortable Lumbar Support, Comfy Flip-up Arms for Home, Bedroom, Study, Student, Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Ergonomic Lumbar Support】- The ergonomically designed backrest of our ergonomic office chair has prominent lumbar support to fit the natural curvature of the spine. The Computer Desk Chair with mid-back brings quality and comfort to any office.

【Comfortable Seat】- Ergonomic features an all-elastic premium mesh back and a high-density sponge seat making the mesh office chair a good choice for all-day comfortable office seating. The unique mesh design is skin-friendly and breathable, which keeps you cool all day.

【Space-saving】- Flip-up armrests are available and won't be in your way when not in use. The Armrests of the computer chair provide comfortable support for your arms and can be flipped up to save space effectively while not in use.

【Multifunctional Mechanism】- The seat height of this 360° Rotating chair could be easily adjusted by the pneumatic adjustment lever, and the adjustment range is 18.5-22.2 inches. Besides, the rocking mode helps you to relax from hard work. It is perfect for the office, bedroom, study room, living room, or gaming room.

【Smooth Movement & Stability】- Our comfy office desk chair comes with smooth and multi-direction casters, which allow you to move the chair around effortlessly. They can run smoothly on tile, wooden floors, carpets, and other floorings. The large 5-star base increases stability even at the full height range. The maximum weight capacity is 250 lbs.

【Easy Assembly】 - The home office chair comes with installation instructions and all necessary hardware& tools. We also offer a video to help you, allowing the office chair installation to be completed within 10-15 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sweetcrispy is formed to streamline home and office decor by providing ergonomically sound chairs that put your comfort at the forefront.
Previous page Next page Through relentless refining of our products, we’ve managed to perfect the chair to peak performance.
Previous page Next page We believe everyone deserves somewhere comfortable to fit. This is why we’ve positioned our potent pieces as very affordable whilst still not sacrificing quality.
Our chairs are expertly designed to support your body, back, and muscles as you go about your daily life in true comfort and confidence.

Sturdy Metal Base Maximum capacity up to 250lbs, heavy-duty metal base, more stability, and safety. Smooth and Sturdy Wheels The casters of office chair provide great mobility, suitable for hard floors, carpet, and more. Flexible Gas Spring Durable gas spring makes the height adjustment of this mesh office chair easier and more flexible. 360° Swivel Chair Desk chair also features 360-degree rotation for multi-tasking convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: The Sweetcrispy Office Computer Desk Chair has proven to be a game-changer in my quest for the perfect blend of comfort and functionality. As someone spending long hours at a desk, the ergonomic design, and user-friendly features of this chair have truly stood out.The comfort level is unparalleled, making it a standout choice for extended work sessions. The mid-back mesh provides just the right amount of support, ensuring that even after a full 8-hour day, my back feels well-cushioned and fatigue-free. The ergonomic design is particularly beneficial for those with unique body shapes, like myself—a woman with a bigger-than-normal rear end. The chair molds to the contours of the body, providing a customized and supportive experience that caters to individual needs.The ease of mobility is another noteworthy feature. The ability to effortlessly wheel around the office adds a level of convenience that enhances productivity. The smooth swivel and rolling mechanism make it a breeze to transition between tasks without the need for awkward readjustments.The chair's construction is robust and durable, assuring me that it's built to withstand the rigors of daily use. The mesh material not only contributes to the overall modern aesthetic but also promotes ventilation, preventing discomfort during warmer days.Assembly was a straightforward process, and the chair's adjustable features, such as height and tilt, make it adaptable to different workstations and personal preferences. The inclusion of armrests adds an extra layer of comfort, making it a well-rounded choice for those in search of a chair that ticks all the ergonomic boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is a pretty good deal for the price. Are there better chairs out there? Probably. Are they going to cost 2-3 times the price? Absolutely. For $60, this is a great chair and I don't intend to return it.Good:Support - normally my back and neck hurt after an hour or so of sitting in my "nice" chair, but this chair has helped reduce the pain significantly. The seat is pretty cushiony and the back is firm but a little flexible.Size - much smaller than my previous chair which means it fits under my desk, even with my legs crossed, and is much more maneuverable in general.Sturdy - I feel like I can lean back and it isn't going to fall apart.Easy to assemble - very easy to assemble, probably took me about 25-30 minutes and I didn't have any questions along the way.Not bad just "eh":Wheels - the wheels aren't the best, they kind of drag the ground when you slide and I do have a silicone mat to help with that. I may get new, nicer wheels.Fabric - while the seat and back fabric are soft and comfortable, the mesh collects any and everything very easily and it doesn't just come off with a swipe of your hand. So if you have long hair, dog hair, crumbs, etc it will all cling to the fabric and you'll need to lint roll it a couple of time to get everything out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t Spend $100+ on a Chair, Get This One!
reviews.reviewText: So I was super torn about buying that viral office chair on TikTok that you can cross your legs in, but I did NOT wanna buy into the TikTok shop. This is the perfect office chair for the price that isn’t ugly and super comfortable. I can cross my legs in it and sit at my desk comfortably at any height, and the fact that you can raise or lower the armrests adds to being able to sit crisscross applesauce. It was actually stupid easy to put together—the directions were maybe 7-8 steps max, and it took me maybe 30 minutes to assemble the chair with only the tools they provided. No drill necessary.I wanted a chair that wasn’t going to kill my back but was still cushiony and this one is it. The back support isn’t so stiff that you can’t slouch, and the cushioning is breathable and soft. I weigh 185 and this chair is definitely sturdy, including with the adjustable tilt function. I thought this chair reclined like A LOT but you really only get 5°-10° of tilt, which is still nice.10/10 would recommend for WFH. Got this chair for $60 and can’t believe I was looking at chairs over $100.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loving it. Best value for the price
reviews.reviewText: For the price, I am absolutely loving this chair. I’ve had it for about a month now and find it to be comfortable. I don’t like having really heavy bulky chairs, but with that usually comes a sacrifice in padding and comfort. While this chair is not overly plush, I like that the back frame isn’t covered in hard plastic, but a kind of flexible(ish) mesh that is tight and offers a decent amount of support. I also like that the arm rests can move up and down as I frequently find myself wishing I did and didn’t have them. LolThere is room in the back of the chair for storage as it suggests. I haven’t used it much, but when I have it’s been ok. I could see where trying to overfill it would lead the chair to be lumpy in the back. Definitely better for slimmer storage like a folder or notebook.Overall Id say that for the price, it has a lot of value. It was easy to put together and supplies were provided. Packaging was minimal, but still enough to protect the contents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Similar chairs are going for $100+ at the local office supply stores. This chair is a bargain and worth every penny - easy to assemble and very comfortable. The best feature is the fold-up armrests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this chair for the home office. It was easy to put together and is holding up well. The chair is comfortable for using most of the day and is adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Chair ! Economical Price but not cheap!!
reviews.reviewText: It's incredible comfortable and portable thanks to the wheels. It was very easy to assemble. The instructions were easy to read and all the screws and tools were there. I hate assembling things like this but it was a snap. I love my new chair. Working from home and writing my novels now will be a breeze! I highly recommned this product! No complaints!!!
